p: A phylogenetic tree was constructed using the neighbor-joining method to evaluate the similarity of Streptomyces sp. strain DBT34 with other species of Streptomyces. Results indicated that sequence of strain DBT34 was highly analogous to Streptomyces glauciniger type strain CGMCC 41858 (99.51%) followed by Streptomyces erringtonii type strain I36 (98.92%) and Streptomyces avellaneus type strain NBRC13451 (97.35%). In a similar analysis, Tan et al. [ 23] reported that Streptomyces sp. strain MUM256 exhibited a maximum 16S-rRNA gene sequence identity to Streptomyces albidoflavusDSM40455 T (99.7%) and Streptomyces hydrogenansNBRC13475 T (99.7%).
